designs and develops websites

The Plunge D.C.

Contracted by Eyler Creative to build Special Olympic D.C. (SODC) a fundraising platform for their Polar Bear Plunge event. Integrated Authorize.net and allowed for participants to have pages they could then direct friends and relatives to donate to. In the two years the site helped SODC raise over a 1.5 million dollars.

  • 2014, 2015
  • Development | Javascript | Plugins | Wordpress

The Tabard Inn

Contracted by Eyler Creative to initially update Tabard Inn's previous Drupal Site. When the client felt they weren't getting enough from Drupal I was brought in once again to customize a Wordpress Theme to fit their exact specifications and to ensure they lost no functionality from their previous site.

  • 2013
  • Contract | Plugins | Wordpress
